channel.title: Ensign on Rotational Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Ensign on Rotational Labs

item.title: PubSub 101 - Using the PyEnsign SDK
item.description:
The Python SDK is the most popular way to use Ensign. In this module you will write some Python code to publish data to your project.

If you missed the first post of this series and want to learn how to create a free Ensign account and set up a new project, check that out here!

item.title: PubSub 101 - Creating Your Project
item.description: Welcome to PubSub 101! In this module you will create a new Ensign account and a new project. After completing this module, you will have an API key that you can use to publish data to Ensign!

item.title: ESG is a Data Problem
item.description: A new SEC proposal will make publicly traded orgs disclose ESG data like environmental impacts and workforce stats. Many anticipate challenges to compliance, but a new approach to data synthesis is here to help.
